Refund Policy

Refunds may be available for Atlas Games purchases subject to platform policies and the eligibility criteria outlined below. Please review these terms before requesting a refund.

Last updated: August 11, 2025

Overview

Most Atlas Games purchases are processed through third-party platforms such as Itch.io. For these purchases, the platform's refund policy applies first and takes precedence over this policy. Please check with the platform where you made your purchase for their specific refund procedures.

For purchases made directly from Atlas Games (if available), this refund policy applies. We strive to provide fair and reasonable refund options while protecting our business from abuse.

Digital goods are typically non-returnable once downloaded, accessed, or played, as they cannot be "returned" in the traditional sense. However, we recognize that exceptional circumstances may warrant refund consideration under the conditions outlined below.

Refund Eligibility

To be eligible for a refund, your request must meet the following criteria:

  • Time window: Request must be made within 14 days of purchase and with less than 2 hours of playtime
  • Proof of purchase: You must provide valid proof of purchase including order ID, receipt email, or transaction reference
  • Valid reason: Technical issues, accidental purchases, or legitimate dissatisfaction with the product
  • Regional rights: Additional consumer protection rights may apply based on your local jurisdiction
  • Gift purchases: Gifts or product keys obtained from third parties are subject to the original seller's refund policy
  • Payment disputes: Initiating chargebacks or payment disputes may result in license revocation and account restrictions

Non-Refundable Cases

The following situations are generally not eligible for refunds:

  • Substantial use: Games played for 2 hours or more, or completed content/campaigns
  • Discounted purchases: Heavily discounted bundles, charity packs, or promotional items (unless required by law)
  • Time limits exceeded: Requests made more than 14 days after purchase
  • Policy violations: Account suspensions or bans due to violations of our Terms of Service, EULA, or Community Guidelines
  • System compatibility: Issues arising from failure to meet published system requirements
  • Change of mind: Simple preference changes after substantial gameplay or content consumption

Platform-Specific Guidance

Itch.io Purchases

For games purchased through Itch.io, please follow their refund process first. Itch.io has its own refund policies and procedures that take precedence.

Itch.io Refund Policy

Other Storefronts

For purchases through other digital storefronts or platforms, please refer to their respective refund policies and support systems.

Contact Support

Direct Purchases

For purchases made directly from Atlas Games, please use the contact form below or email us directly with your refund request.

Refund Request Form

Technical Issues

If you're experiencing technical problems, please try our support resources first. Many issues can be resolved without requiring a refund.

Report Technical Issue

How to Request a Refund

Follow these steps to request a refund for eligible purchases:

  1. Confirm eligibility: Verify that your purchase meets the time window and playtime requirements listed above
  2. Gather required information: Collect your order ID, purchase confirmation email, game title, purchase date, and reason for the refund request
  3. Contact us: Submit your request using the form below or email us directly at the address provided
  4. Wait for review: We'll review your request and respond within our stated timeframe with a decision

Direct Contact

Email: atlasgamesstudio22@gmail.com

Include "Refund Request" in your subject line for faster processing.

Technical issues? Before requesting a refund, consider visiting our Support Center or reporting the bug to see if we can resolve the issue.

Refund Request Form

Please fill out all required fields to help us process your refund request efficiently.

Contact Information

Name associated with the purchase.

Email used for the original purchase.

Purchase Details

Date when you made the purchase.

Order ID, transaction reference, or link to purchase confirmation.

Approximate time spent playing the game.

Refund Request

Please explain why you're requesting a refund. Include any technical issues or other relevant details.

Processing & Timeline

Review Process

We typically review refund requests within 3-7 business days of submission. During peak periods, processing may take slightly longer.

Approved Refunds

If your refund is approved, please allow additional time for your bank or payment platform to process the refund. This can take 3-10 business days depending on your payment method and financial institution.

Denied Refunds

If your refund request is denied, we'll provide a clear explanation of the reason and any available next steps or alternatives.

Need updates? You can contact us at atlasgamesstudio22@gmail.com to check on the status of your refund request.

Chargebacks & Disputes

Before initiating a chargeback or payment dispute with your bank or credit card company, please contact our support team first. We're committed to resolving issues fairly and quickly.

Important: Chargebacks initiated without first attempting to resolve the issue through our support channels may result in immediate revocation of your game licenses and restriction of access to our services.

We reserve the right to contest illegitimate chargebacks and may provide evidence of valid purchases and terms acceptance to financial institutions and payment processors.

Consumer Rights

This refund policy does not limit any mandatory consumer protection rights that may apply in your jurisdiction. Some regions have laws that provide additional refund rights beyond what is outlined in this policy.

If you believe you have consumer rights that extend beyond this policy, please contact us and reference the specific consumer protection laws in your region.

We are committed to complying with all applicable consumer protection regulations and will honor any legally required refund rights.

Related Information

For additional help and information, please review these related pages:

  • Support Center
  • Report a Bug
  • System Requirements
  • Terms of Service
  • EULA
  • Privacy Policy
  • Cookie Policy

Atlas Games
  • Home
  • Games
  • Team
  • Blog
  • Contact
  • Support
  • Play Our Games

Support Center

Get help with our games, report issues, and find answers to common questions. Our support team is here to ensure you have the best gaming experience possible.

Quick Support Options

Report a Bug

Found an issue? Let us know and we'll fix it.

System Requirements

Check if your device can run our games.

Refund Policy

Learn about our refund and return process.

Community Guidelines

Read our community rules and standards.

Knowledge Base

Start here for answers to common questions. Browse our frequently asked questions organized by topic to find quick solutions.

Installation & Updates

How do I download and install games?

Visit our Itch.io page and click the download button for your desired game. Extract the ZIP file to a folder on your computer and run the executable file. No additional installation required for most of our games.

How do I check for updates?

Updates are distributed through Itch.io. Re-download the game from your library to get the latest version. We recommend backing up your save files before updating.

Where are my save files located?

Save files are typically stored in your user documents folder under "AtlasGames/[GameName]". You can also check the game's installation directory for a "saves" or "data" folder.

Can I play games offline?

Yes! All our downloadable games work completely offline once installed. Only web-based versions require an internet connection to play.

Crashes & Performance

My game crashes on startup. What should I do?

Try running the game as administrator, update your graphics drivers, and ensure your system meets the minimum requirements. Disable antivirus temporarily to rule out interference.

The game runs slowly or stutters.

Lower the graphics settings in the game options menu. Close other applications to free up system resources. Consider playing in windowed mode if fullscreen causes issues.

Can I change graphics settings?

Most of our games include basic graphics options accessible through the main menu or settings screen. Look for resolution, fullscreen toggle, and quality presets.

How do I report a crash?

Use our bug report form and include your system specifications, what you were doing when the crash occurred, and any error messages that appeared.

Accounts & Purchases

Do I need an account to play?

No account required for most of our games. However, creating an Itch.io account helps you manage your game library and receive updates more easily.

How do I get a refund?

Refunds are handled through the platform where you purchased the game. For Itch.io purchases, contact their support team. See our refund policy for details.

Can I play on multiple devices?

Yes! Once you purchase a game, you can download and install it on any compatible device. Your Itch.io library keeps track of your purchases.

Are there in-game purchases?

Our games focus on complete experiences with no additional purchases required. What you buy is what you get - no microtransactions or DLC.

Troubleshooting Guides

Game Won't Launch

  • Run as administrator
  • Update graphics drivers
  • Check antivirus settings
  • Verify system requirements
Still stuck? Report a bug

Low FPS or Stutter

  • Lower graphics settings
  • Close background applications
  • Try windowed mode
  • Update graphics drivers
Still stuck? Report a bug

Controller Not Detected

  • Check USB connection
  • Enable controller in settings
  • Try a different USB port
  • Restart the game
Still stuck? Report a bug

Audio Issues

  • Check system volume levels
  • Verify audio device selection
  • Update audio drivers
  • Restart the game
Still stuck? Report a bug

Cloud Save Not Syncing

  • Check internet connection
  • Manually backup save files
  • Re-download from Itch.io
  • Contact platform support
Still stuck? Report a bug

General Issues

  • Restart your computer
  • Re-extract game files
  • Check for Windows updates
  • Disable overclocking
Still stuck? Report a bug

Contact Support

If you can't find the answer you're looking for in our knowledge base, we're here to help. Choose the best way to reach out based on your needs.

Email Support

For technical issues, bug reports, or general questions about our games.

Send Email

Discord Community

Join our community for quick help from other players and direct access to developers.

Join Discord

Press & Media

Journalists and content creators can find press kits, assets, and media contacts.

Visit Press Page

Join Our Team

Interested in working with us? Check out our open positions and application process.

View Careers

Status & Updates

Stay informed about game updates, patch notes, and any service issues by checking our blog. We post regular development updates and notify the community of any known issues or planned maintenance.

See Latest Posts

Policies & Legal

Privacy Policy

How we collect and use your information

Terms of Service

Rules and conditions for using our games

End User License

Software license agreement and usage rights

Refund Policy

Return and refund process information

Cookie Policy

How we use cookies on our website

Community Guidelines

Standards for community interaction

Atlas Games
  • Home
  • Games
  • Team
  • Blog
  • Contact
  • Support
  • Play Our Games

System Requirements

Our games support Windows, macOS, and Linux platforms with specifications that vary by title and target performance settings.

Important Notes

  • Specifications are representative for our current catalog and may change with game updates or new releases
  • Laptop GPUs with similar performance levels are generally supported, though may require adjusted settings
  • Stable internet connection required for game updates, leaderboards, and online features where applicable
  • Controller support is optional and varies by title; all games support keyboard and mouse input
  • For crashes, performance issues, or compatibility problems, please visit our Support Center or submit a bug report

Platform Support

Windows

Full support for Windows 10 and 11 (64-bit) with DirectX 11+ compatibility. Our primary development and testing platform.

View Windows Requirements

macOS

Compatible with macOS 12+ on both Intel and Apple Silicon Macs. Metal API support required for optimal performance.

View macOS Requirements

Linux

Tested on Ubuntu 22.04+ and similar distributions. Some titles may require Proton compatibility layer for optimal experience.

View Linux Requirements

Windows Requirements

Our games are tested on Windows 10 and 11 (64-bit) systems with DirectX 11 or newer. Older versions of Windows are not officially supported but may work with reduced compatibility.

Minimum Requirements

Windows minimum system requirements
Component Specification
CPU Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
GPU GTX 750 Ti / RX 560 / Intel UHD 730 or equivalent
RAM 8 GB
Storage 2-5 GB free space per title
OS Windows 10/11 64-bit
DirectX DirectX 11 or newer
Notes 720p@30fps on low settings

Recommended Requirements

Windows recommended system requirements
Component Specification
CPU Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
GPU GTX 1060 / RX 580 / Intel Arc A380 or equivalent
RAM 16 GB
Storage 5 GB free space, SSD recommended
OS Windows 11 64-bit
DirectX DirectX 12
Notes 1080p@60fps on high settings

macOS Requirements

Compatible with macOS 12 (Monterey) and newer on both Intel and Apple Silicon Macs. Metal API support is required for graphics rendering. Some titles may have enhanced performance on Apple Silicon.

Minimum Requirements

macOS minimum system requirements
Component Specification
CPU Intel i5-7400 / Apple M1 or equivalent
GPU Radeon Pro 555 / Intel Iris Plus / Apple M1 integrated
RAM 8 GB
Storage 2-5 GB free space per title
OS macOS 12.0 (Monterey) or newer
Graphics API Metal support required
Notes 720p@30fps on low settings

Recommended Requirements

macOS recommended system requirements
Component Specification
CPU Intel i7-9700K / Apple M2 or equivalent
GPU Radeon Pro 5500M / Apple M2 integrated or better
RAM 16 GB
Storage 5 GB free space, SSD recommended
OS macOS 14.0 (Sonoma) or newer
Graphics API Metal 3 support
Notes 1080p@60fps on high settings

Linux Requirements

Tested on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS and similar distributions with Vulkan support. Some titles may require Proton compatibility layer through Steam for optimal experience. Native Linux builds available for select titles.

Minimum Requirements

Linux minimum system requirements
Component Specification
CPU Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
GPU GTX 750 Ti / RX 560 with Vulkan support
RAM 8 GB
Storage 2-5 GB free space per title
OS Ubuntu 22.04+ or equivalent distribution
Graphics API Vulkan 1.1 or newer
Notes 720p@30fps, may require Proton

Recommended Requirements

Linux recommended system requirements
Component Specification
CPU Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
GPU GTX 1060 / RX 580 with Vulkan support
RAM 16 GB
Storage 5 GB free space, SSD recommended
OS Ubuntu 24.04+ or equivalent distribution
Graphics API Vulkan 1.3 or newer
Notes 1080p@60fps on high settings

Game-Specific Notes

Harvest Hustle

Very light system requirements. Runs smoothly on integrated GPUs at 1080p with low settings. Excellent choice for older hardware.

Kenny's Khaos

Physics-heavy scenes during intense platforming may require mid-tier GPU for consistent 60fps. CPU-intensive during particle effects.

Tiny Cafe

CPU-bound performance during high NPC counts and complex restaurant simulations. Benefits significantly from higher core count processors.

Void Breaker

Benefits greatly from SSD storage for seamless level streaming and reduced loading times. High-speed storage recommended for optimal experience.

Timmy's Revenge

Controller strongly recommended for optimal gameplay experience. Supports Xbox, PlayStation, and generic XInput-compatible controllers.

Honey Haven

Stable performance at 1080p medium settings on entry-level GPUs. Well-optimized for lower-end hardware with scalable graphics options.

Display & Input Support

Display

  • Primary testing at 1920x1080 (1080p) resolution
  • Ultrawide monitor support (21:9 aspect ratio) available
  • 4K gaming supported on recommended hardware specs
  • Windowed, borderless, and fullscreen modes
  • Variable refresh rate (G-Sync/FreeSync) compatibility

Input

  • Keyboard and mouse support (primary input method)
  • XInput-compatible controllers (Xbox, generic)
  • PlayStation controllers with additional drivers
  • Key remapping varies by title (check in-game settings)
  • Steam Input support for custom controller configurations

Need Help?

Support Center

Browse troubleshooting guides and FAQs

Report a Bug

Submit technical issues and crashes

Community Guidelines

Rules for community interaction

Refund Policy

Information about returns and refunds

Storage 2-5 GB free space per title
OS Ubuntu 22.04+ or equivalent distribution
Graphics API Vulkan 1.1 or newer
Notes 720p@30fps, may require Proton

Recommended Requirements

Linux recommended system requirements
Component Specification
CPU Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or equivalent
GPU GTX 1060 / RX 580 with Vulkan support
RAM 16 GB
Storage 5 GB free space, SSD recommended
OS Ubuntu 24.04+ or equivalent distribution
Graphics API Vulkan 1.3 or newer
Notes 1080p@60fps on high settings

Game-Specific Notes

Harvest Hustle

Very light system requirements. Runs smoothly on integrated GPUs at 1080p with low settings. Excellent choice for older hardware.

Kenny's Khaos

Physics-heavy scenes during intense platforming may require mid-tier GPU for consistent 60fps. CPU-intensive during particle effects.

Tiny Cafe

CPU-bound performance during high NPC counts and complex restaurant simulations. Benefits significantly from higher core count processors.

Void Breaker

Benefits greatly from SSD storage for seamless level streaming and reduced loading times. High-speed storage recommended for optimal experience.

Timmy's Revenge

Controller strongly recommended for optimal gameplay experience. Supports Xbox, PlayStation, and generic XInput-compatible controllers.

Honey Haven

Stable performance at 1080p medium settings on entry-level GPUs. Well-optimized for lower-end hardware with scalable graphics options.

Display & Input Support

Display

  • Primary testing at 1920x1080 (1080p) resolution
  • Ultrawide monitor support (21:9 aspect ratio) available
  • 4K gaming supported on recommended hardware specs
  • Windowed, borderless, and fullscreen modes
  • Variable refresh rate (G-Sync/FreeSync) compatibility

Input

  • Keyboard and mouse support (primary input method)
  • XInput-compatible controllers (Xbox, generic)
  • PlayStation controllers with additional drivers
  • Key remapping varies by title (check in-game settings)
  • Steam Input support for custom controller configurations

Need Help?

Support Center

Browse troubleshooting guides and FAQs

Report a Bug

Submit technical issues and crashes

Community Guidelines

Rules for community interaction

Refund Policy

Information about returns and refunds

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
Meet the Atlas Games Team

Our passionate team of developers, artists, and designers work together to craft immersive gaming experiences. United by our love for storytelling and innovation, we bring diverse skills and perspectives to every project.

Matthew Derek Rall

Lead Game Designer

Passionate about creating engaging gameplay mechanics and memorable player experiences. With expertise in systems design and narrative integration, Matthew leads our creative vision from concept to completion.

Liam Schultz

Senior Developer

Specializes in gameplay programming and technical optimization. Liam brings complex game systems to life with clean, efficient code and ensures our games run smoothly across all platforms.

Keagan Du Plessis

Art Director

Creates stunning visual experiences that bring our game worlds to life. Keagan oversees all artistic elements from character design to environmental art, ensuring cohesive and captivating visual storytelling.

Sarah Chen

Creative Director

Guides the overall creative vision and narrative direction of our games. With extensive experience in storytelling and world-building, Sarah ensures every project delivers meaningful and engaging experiences.

Marcus Rodriguez

Lead Developer

Architects robust game engines and implements cutting-edge technology solutions. Marcus leads our technical team in creating scalable, performant systems that power our most ambitious projects.

Elena Vasquez

UI/UX Designer

Designs intuitive and beautiful user interfaces that enhance player experience. Elena combines aesthetic sensibility with usability principles to create seamless interactions throughout our games.

Join Our Team

We're always looking for passionate, talented individuals who share our vision of creating extraordinary gaming experiences. If you're ready to be part of something special and help us build games that endure, we'd love to hear from you.

Get In Touch

Terms of Service

Eligibility

You must be at least 13 years of age to use our services. If you are between 13 and 18 years old (or the age of majority in your jurisdiction), you may only use our services with the consent and supervision of a parent or legal guardian.

Parents and guardians are responsible for monitoring their children's use of our services and ensuring compliance with these Terms and our Community Guidelines.

By using our services, you represent and warrant that you meet these age requirements and have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement.

Accounts

While we do not currently require user accounts for most services, if we introduce account functionality in the future:

  • You are responsible for maintaining the security and confidentiality of your account credentials
  • You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account

  • We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms

We may require email verification or other authentication methods to ensure account security and prevent abuse.

User Content & Conduct

Your Content

You retain ownership of any content you submit to our services (such as comments, bug reports, or community posts). By submitting content, you grant Atlas Games a non-exclusive, worldwide, royalty-free license to use, display, and distribute your content in connection with our services.

Prohibited Content

  • Illegal, harmful, threatening, abusive, or harassing

Technical Restrictions

You may not attempt to reverse engineer, decompile, scrape, or create derivative works of our services. Automated data collection and exploit attempts are strictly prohibited.

Our End User License Agreement provides detailed terms for game downloads, installations, usage rights, and restrictions.
